description:
Attorney Bruce M. Plaxen founded the Baltimore law office of Plaxen & Adler, P.A., with the goal of helping victims and their families during the aftermath of accidents and other incidents stemming from negligence. Since 1985, we have been diligently pursuing justice for victims in Maryland, and we can help you too. Put your trust in our law firm's attorneys if you need help because of any of the following:

  • Automobile accidents, including bicycle and pedestrian accidents
  • Defective products
  • Dog bites
  • Fungal meningitis
  • Medical malpractice, including birth injuries and surgical errors
  • Premises liability
  • Social Security Disability
  • Workers’ compensation, initial claims and appeals
  • Wrongful death

In the nearly 30 years since the founding of our law firm, we have continually expanded our personal injury practice. We now have nine law offices located all across the state of Maryland served by three experienced attorneys and a team of dedicated paralegals. Regardless of where you live in the state or the type of incident that led to your injuries, we will work to ensure that we provide you with guidance, support and high-quality legal representation.

In addition to serving the victims of negligence, we also serve victims' families. If you lost a loved one to another person's negligence, you have the right to pursue compensation for your losses. To find out more, you can take advantage of our law firm's free initial consultation. We will be happy to schedule your appointment for an evening or weekend, and will gladly come to you if you are unable to travel. Put Plaxen & Adler, P.A.'s experience and dedication to work for you today.
